column2: A gigantic boar sent by Artemis to ravage Calydon.  Was slain in the Calydonian Boar Hunt.
Gigantic winged sow which terrorized the Greek town of Klazomenai in Ionia Asia Minor.
The Crommyonian Sow was a wild pig that ravaged the region around the village of Crommyon between Megara and Corinth and was eventually slain by Theseus in his early adventures.
A gigantic boar which Heracles was sent to retrieve as one of his labors.
